## Checklist

<!-- Ensure you've completed these steps before requesting review -->

- [ ] Follows the [pattern template](../CONTRIBUTING.md#pattern-template) (if new pattern)
- [ ] Code examples are present and correct
- [ ] Cross-references to related patterns are included
- [ ] `__index__.md` is updated (if adding new pattern)
- [ ] No unrelated changes included
- [ ] Branch is rebased on latest main
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Read and followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

## Conflict Prevention

<!-- Help reviewers and other contributors -->

- [ ] Checked for similar open PRs before starting
- [ ] Kept changes focused (one pattern per PR)
- [ ] Updated `__index__.md` last (after rebasing)
- [ ] Coordinated with others if editing heavily-modified files
